```
 RUN apt-get update && \
 apt-get install -y python
```

```
FROM ubuntu:16.04
MAINTAINER Rafal Leszko
RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y python
COPY hello.py .
ENTRYPOINT ["python", "hello.py"]
```

```
        import os
        print "Hello World from %s !" % os.environ['NAME']
```
